title: Hot Report
content:
Decided to "half-finish" an old project from 2005. Its only A-Z characters because the way this typeface was been made is unpredictable and hard to plan. I used a custom js script with Scriptographer to render half of the work, and all foldings are geometrically realistic

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203012420im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hot_report_5227.jpg)

[http://www.drgs.no/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203012420/http:/www.drgs.no/ "http://www.drgs.no/")
author: kveldulfr
